text: Ana havi anumzane ana havi anumzama kofiza vanoma nehaza vahe'mo'zanena zamarena re'za kepri hugahaze. Hagi ana havi anumzamo'a erino'ma vanoma nehaza vahera agura ovazinigeno erino'ma vanoma nehia vahe'mo'a ana havi anumzana agura ovazigahiankino, taregamokiznia zamavare'za kina ome huzmantegahaze.
